recipesJson.name: Screwed Strawberry CreamYo
recipesJson.author: Screwdriver
recipesJson.description:
Here's my Strawberry & Creamy Yogurt ADV, and yes, there's a lot of Strawberries, and they all need a lot of sweetener...
You really should try the Cream Milky Undertone PG & Creamy Yogurt combination, it's wonderful here.

3.5%     Red Touch (Strawberry) (FA)
2.5%     Strawberry (Ripe) (TPA)
1.5%      Sweet Strawberry (Jungle Flavors)
1%         Strawberry Shisha (INW)
0.5%     Dragonfruit (TPA)
0.25%   Blackcurrant (FA)

3%        Creamy Yogurt (CAP)
1.25%    Cream Milky Undertone PG (OOO)
0.5%     Caramel (FA)

0.5%     Meringue (FA)
0.5%     Super Sweet (CAP)

All the best, enjoy & comment the good and bad.
Screwdriver
